name: Chicken Boy's Counterattack
description:
This is a casual game that does not have a cumbersome or complex skill system. Players only need to click the mouse and keyboard to operate, and the cost of getting started is extremely low.

Currently, there are two game modes:

1. Classic mode
In this mode, players will use a mouse or controller to counter bullets fired by enemies in the game and then kill them. Meanwhile, avoid bullets. Players need to earn as many points as possible. During the game, you can collect coins to unlock more heroes. Currently, there are two sub modes: PVE, opposing AI (single or multiplayer); PVP, player to player confrontation (multiplayer)

2. Find different options
In this mode, players will recognize whether different layers are the same as layer 0. If they are the same, they will walk to the right, otherwise they will play left.
